about: I'm a web developer specialized in the JavaScript ecosystem. I love to craft high-quality software through clean code and best practices.

1.title: Portfolio
1.summary: This website that I built to showcase my skills and present my profile.
1.description: I wanted to build a website that would represent me and showcase my skills and my profile. I decided to code my own website from scratch, using React, Vite and TypeScript.

2.title: TaskApp
2.summary: I crafted a task application allowing smooth daily organization.
2.description: I decided to code a task app that would be simple, straightforward and efficient. I used Node.js, Express.js and MySQL2 to build it from scratch.

3.title: Password Generator
3.summary: I crafted a password generator offering multiple generation choices.
3.description: In my quest and passion for programming, I coded a password generator using Python that allows users to choose from multiple generation options.

tasks.Developed 60% of the front-end, accordin: Developed 60% of the front-end, according to the UX/UI designs.
tasks.Integrated the app's AI with Apple and A: Integrated the app's AI with Apple and Android smartwatches.
tasks.Collaborate with the CEO and CTO to defi: Collaborate with the CEO and CTO to define priorities.

2.title: Full Stack Developer @Efficy
2.description: Crafted multiple projects tailored for various customers.

tasks.Designed and developed 20+ new features: Designed and developed 20+ new features using JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, SQL and SVN.
tasks.Debugged and identified 40+ issues, cont: Debugged and identified 40+ issues, contributing to a customer satisfaction increase of up to 95%.
tasks.Collaborated using Agile methodologies w: Collaborated using Agile methodologies within cross-functional teams.

3.title: Full Stack Developer @BSynchro
3.description: Developed a beta version movie project.

tasks.Collaborated with senior developers to c: Collaborated with senior developers to code responsive and interactive interfaces using Angular and C#.
